response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. We are offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your interest and commitment to excellence. Please let us know if you wish to proceed with this unique acquisition.", "product_price": 1200000}
